content.p: Radio Television Malaysia (RTM) Internship Description: RTM, an agency under the Ministry of Information, Communication and Culture is tasked with disseminating information through radio, TV and the new media. As a public broadcast station, RTM now operates 35 radio stations, two television channels, TVi available on ASTRO channel 180 and Muzik Aktif on broadband. RTMâ€™s primary function is to fulfil its social obligation and be partially commercial. RTM internship programme allows student to gain experience in various news desks and programming in a broadcasting environment in order to transmit radio and television information and entertainment programmes of a competitive standard that caters to the varied needs of the audience using the latest technics while fulfilling the nation's vision. How to apply: Students is encouraged to submit their application form and CV via their respective school and you can download the internship application form here. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
